---
title: "Latent class analysis (LCA) applied to simulated genotypes to deconvolute genetic subtypes"
output:
  html_document:
    theme: yeti
    includes:
      after_body: footer.html 
---

This website lays out a method for investigating the performance on LCA when applied to genotypes in order to determine subtypes of disease from genetic data or to estimate misclassification.
